Message.Title: A good chance to accumulate

Interesting comments at the end of the article above: I do hope Microsoft sells the RT tablet at $299 or less - it would be another instant block buster ($299 with Office is huge - you can actually do some serious stuff on it) Steve Ritschdorff 32 minutes ago “Qualcomm has been working closely with Microsoft and preparing its Snapdragon processors for the Windows 8 tablet to be launched later this year.” Apparently Qualcomm has not been working close enough since their drivers have been rejected by MSFT. Only Nvidia has been approved for the RT launch until Qualcomm gets up to specification. It appears that MSFT will be going with Nvidia as the only vendor to get the volume Tegra 3+ pricing they need so they don’t lose too much when they sell the RT for $199. MSFT is going with the same X box marketing blitz, and selling under cost strategy to establish market share. The RT looks sharp, and should have a unique advantage over Apple as they integrate advanced X box capabilities along with advanced cloud computing. The RT also has positive enterprise ramifications that the iPad is proving to be lagging in.
Accumulated losses!!!! NVDA is going to $12 again. Strong SELL!!!!
